# AI Talk Coach
> AI-powered speaking coach for founders, professionals, and creators. Practice live, get analytics, improve clarity and confidence.

## Primary URLs
- https://aitalkcoach.com/
- https://aitalkcoach.com/blog
- https://aitalkcoach.com/pricing

## Core Topics
- Public speaking practice
- Communication coaching
- Filler-word reduction
- Speech pacing and clarity analytics
